about.app_purpose: This web app was created for the quick retrieval of historical weather observations for eBird checklists.

daily_limits.text: To help prevent RainCrow downtime there is a limit of 5 weather requests per user every 12 hours.
daily_limits.title: Daily Limits

about.email_me: If you have any comments or suggestions, feel free to email me at parker@birdsmakesound.com!

error_429.text: If you get a error with code 429, it means that I've reached my limit of free OpenWeather API calls for the day. I'm working on a solution for this. Sorry, try again tomorrow!
error_429.title: 429 Error?

languages.text: Internationalization (i18n) and French translation added by Marie-Andr√©e Boucher-Beaulieu. Spanish translation by JC Paniagua. If you would like to help add other languages please reach out!
languages.title: Languages

options.icon_and_links: In order for OpenWeather Icons and Include Link options to show up on your eBird checklist, you must include <HTML tags> to embed the images or create the link. You don't need to worry about doing this yourself, the code is included when you click Copy to Clipboard. The images and link will display normally once you submit the copied code to your checklist comments.
options.text: The options menu allows you to select the weather data you want to include.
options.title: Options

pre_submit.allow_location_access: Make sure you allow access to your location.
pre_submit.enable_location_service: Check that location services are enabled.
pre_submit.iphone_users: For iPhone the setting is found under Settings > Privacy > Location Services > (Browser of Choice) > Allow Location Access
pre_submit.text: Use before a checklist is submitted. This is especially useful for including weather in shared checklists.
pre_submit.title: Pre-Submit
pre_submit.toggle_location_preference: If clicking Locate does not prompt you to allow location access, try toggling the location preference off then on again.

submitted.text: Use for checklists that have already been submitted to eBird. Just enter the Checklist ID (or the entire URL) and click Get Weather.
submitted.title: Submitted

weather_data.limitations: There are limitations to the accuracy of any weather API. If you are gathering weather data for a location that is near a weather station it should work just fine. If the location is a remote area with unique microclimate (deep canyons, mountain peaks, open ocean etc.) results will have more room for error. Use at your own discretion!
weather_data.provided_by: Weather data provided by OpenWeather.
weather_data.range_format: Weather data is gathered for both the start and end times of a checklist and automatically displayed as a range.
weather_data.title: Weather Data

clipboard.browser_error: Browser do not support Clipboard API

daily_request.error: You have reached your limit of weather requests for the day.

error.general_server_error: Error getting data from the server

pre_submit.coordinates_error: Please enter valid decimal degree coordinates.
pre_submit.date_error: Enter valid date in format: YYYY-MM-DD
pre_submit.duration_error: Enter valid number of minutes greater than or equal to 0
pre_submit.location_service_error: Location services must be enabled to use "Locate" button.
pre_submit.start_time_error: Enter valid start time in 24hr format: HH:MM

submitted.help: Enter an eBird Checklist ID and click "Get Weather"
submitted.historical_checklist_error: Historical checklists not supported. Need valid time to get weather data.
submitted.invalid_checklist_id: Please enter a valid Checklist ID
submitted.too_old_checklist_error: Dates before Jan 1, 1979 not supported by OpenWeather API.
